Unitron/Dark One:





Dark One barrel rolled again, facing away from the Ark.  Though these 
were just weak laser blasts from the Maximal, a direct hit could take 
him down.  He may have to settle for an attack on the ground.

---

Unitron saw another jet getting shot at by an owl.  His guess, a 
Maximal shooting at an Alliance member.  Getting a lock, he fired off 
10 rapid laser blasts at Shadow Wing.
